section.title: Red Hat Linux Virtual Machines
section.para: On &vmhost; computers running &sle; &productnumber;, Red Hat Enterprise Linux systems are only supported when running fully virtualized and with the latest patch level.
To install a Red Hat virtual machine, proceed as follows:

step.para: Click Forward. Activate I need to install an operating system and click Forward.
Select RedHat as operating system and choose the desired version from the list. Click Forward.
Click on the respective items of the installation settings to change the configuration.
Select Virtual Disk and click Add.
Click Browse and select the path to either the physical installation DVD or to the iso image of the installation DVD. Click Ok.
The actual installation is started by clicking on Ok in the installation summary.
